fields.name: account_number
fields.description: Unique identification number for the specific account

fields.name: statement_period
fields.description: Date range covered by the bank statement

fields.name: logo_path
fields.description: Path to the Wells Fargo logo in the HTML template

fields.name: account_holder_address
fields.description: Address of the account holder as per bank records

fields.name: summary.beginning_balance
fields.description: The balance at the start of the statement period

fields.name: summary.deposits_total
fields.description: Total deposits made during the statement period

fields.name: summary.withdrawals_total
fields.description: Total withdrawals made during the statement period

fields.name: summary.ending_balance
fields.description: The balance at the end of the statement period

fields.name: transaction.description
fields.description: A brief explanation of the purpose behind each transaction

fields.name: transaction.deposits_credits
fields.description: Amount credited in each deposit transaction

fields.name: transaction.withdrawals_debits
fields.description: Amount debited in each withdrawal transaction

fields.name: transaction.ending_balance
fields.description: The balance after the transaction was processed

fields.name: summary.deposits_total
fields.description: Total deposits made during the statement period

fields.name: summary.withdrawals_total
fields.description: Total withdrawals made during the statement period

fields.name: summary.ending_balance
fields.description: The balance at the end of the statement period
